title: Hello, Columbus
text:
Columbus, Ohio • Oct 25, 2015 • 58° Broken Clouds The Columbus Dispatch Need help? Visit our FAQ page or use our Contact Form . Customer Service Need help? Try our live chat or online customer service . For service, call 1-877-734-7728. For other inquiries, use our Contact Form or Staff Directory . Subscriptions Subscribe to The Dispatch online or call 1-877-734-7728. Advertising To place help wanted ads, call 614-888-8888 or visit ColumbusJobs.com For private seller and classified advertising, call 614-888-8888 or visit DispatchClassifieds.com . For retail advertising, call 614-461-5500 or email us . For national advertising, call 614-461-5199. For online advertising, call 614-461-5143 or email us . Newsroom Use our Contact Form , or call 614-461-5200. Dispatch Careers Visit dispatch.com/careers or call 614-461-5033. Fax 614-461-5565. Request to buy this photo Spain: Dan and Regina Bremer of Dublin enjoy a view of the Royal Palace in Madrid. Casual clothes of a basic color such as black can be worn all day and are appropriate anywhere from museums to tapas tours, the couple suggests. Request to buy this photo Dominican Republic: Caitin and Eric Marquardt of Westerville celebrate their 25th wedding anniversary by watching the Ohio State-Virginia Tech football game in a bar in Punta Cana. The couple says substituting que lo que for hola (hello) will be appreciated by the Dominicans you meet. Request to buy this photo Samoa: Joe Eulberg, left, of Westerville and Jeff Steenerson of Apple Valley, Calif., visit American Samoa National Park, the last national park on the travelers’ bucket lists. The men suggest stopping by the park office for updates because not all of the sparsely visited hiking trails are well-marked. Travel 
Powered by Local Corporation Sunday October 25, 2015 3:41 AM 
Just back from a trip? Where did you go? What did you do? Travel would like to share your experience: Choose a vacation photo showing you, your companions and the Dispatch Travel section and upload it at Dispatch.com/HelloColumbus . 
If you want to mail your photo, include your phone number in a letter addressed to Travel, The Dispatch, 34 S. 3rd St., Columbus, OH 43215. Tell us who is in the photo, from left to right, where the photo was taken and include a tip that might help other travelers. 
Because of the volume received, not all photographs can be published and none can be returned.
